channel.title: NRF52840 on NeiNeiHippo
channel.description: Recent content in NRF52840 on NeiNeiHippo

item.title: Nordic NRF52840 Storage Part II
item.description: This post is the continued talk about the persistent storage for Nordic nRF52840. In part I we went over using the Flash Data Storage (FDS) library. In this part II, I’ll be discussing another import component, user information configuration registers (UICR).

item.title: Nordic NRF52840 Storage Part I
item.description: There are mainly two ways for persistent storage of data in NRF52840: flash and UICR. I’ll be discussing the flash mainly in this part I, and UICR in part II.
